description.name: Quick joint PZA 8mm
description.long_desc:
Złączka wtykowa czwórnik, automatyczna - do łączenia pneumatycznych węży elastycznych w różnego rodzaju instalacjach pneumatycznych.

Charakterystyka produktu

  • do łączenia elastycznych węży pneumatycznych
  • automatyczna blokada w momencie wetknięcia węża w złącze
  • odblokowanie po dociśnięciu niebieskiego pierścienia

Dane techniczne

  • Rodzaj: czwórnik
  • Otwór na wąż: 8 mm
  • Materiał wykonania: poliuretan, polietylen
description.short_desc:
Złączka wtykowa czwórnik, automatyczna - do łączenia pneumatycznych węży elastycznych w różnego rodzaju instalacjach pneumatycznych.

  • Otwór na wąż: 8 mm
  • Materiał wykonania: poliuretan, polietylen

category.name: Barrel Pumps
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Fuel Handling and Distribution\Barrel Pumps

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Fuel Handling and Distribution\Barrel Pumps

description.name: AdBlue Rotary Barrel Pump
description.long_desc:
Rotary action polypropylene barrel pump suitable for low viscosity liquids such as DEF - Diesel Exhaust Fluid, urea, AdBlue, petroleum products, glycols, alcohols, detergents, etc. Capable of a flow rate of up to 15 litres per minute.


Product Features



  • Flow rate: up to 15 L/min (0,3 litre per revolution)

  • 3-piece sectional riser tube

  • Fitting 2” BSP barrel adaptor

  • Viscosity: 200 cSt / SAE20

  • Inlet/outlet diameter: 27 mm / 25 mm
description.short_desc:
Rotary action polypropylene barrel pump suitable for low viscosity liquids such as DEF - Diesel Exhaust Fluid, urea, AdBlue, petroleum products, glycols, alcohols, detergents, etc. Capable of a flow rate of up to 15 litres per minute.


Product Features



  • Flow rate: up to 15 L/min (0,3 litre per revolution)

  • 3-piece sectional riser tube

  • Fitting 2” BSP barrel adaptor

  • Viscosity: 200 cSt / SAE20

  • Inlet/outlet diameter: 27 mm / 25 mm

category.name: Mini Cpn Distributors
category.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Fuel Handling and Distribution\Mini Cpn Distributors

category_idosell.path: Tools for The Workshop and Garage\Fuel Handling and Distribution\Mini Cpn Distributors

description.name: AdBlue Pump Kit 230V
description.long_desc:
AdBlue Pump Kit designed for the dispensing of AdBlue™, otherwise known as DEF.


Product Features



  • Electric 230V membrane pump specifically designed for the distribution of AdBlue.

  • Powerful engine with 330W

  • Self-prime unit with one way suction valve

  • 2m clear suction hose strengthened with wire winding

  • 4m non-clear delivery hose

  • Inlet and outlet diameter: 1"


Technical Data



  • Power: 330W

  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • No-load Speed: 2,800 rpm

  • Duty Cycle: 30 min/h

  • Self-priming up to 5 m above liquid level

  • Flow Rate: up to 40 L/min

  • Maximum Liquid Temperature: 60°C

  • Inlet and Outlet Diameter: 1"


Package Contents:



  • 1x 230V DC Self-priming Electric Pump

  • 1x AdBlue fuel nozzle

  • 1x suction hose 2 m

  • 1x high quality delivery hose 4 m

  • 1x connector

  • 1x filter
description.short_desc:

category.name: Painting Guns and Units
category.path: Construction and Renovation\Painting Guns and Units

category_idosell.path: Construction and Renovation\Painting Guns and Units

description.name: Electrical painting zoom set gun and compressor
description.long_desc:
Electric Paint Sprayer 650W. 360 degree spray technology allows you to spray swiftly and accurately hard to reach areas, coating walls, ceilings, decking and other surfaces with minimal effort. Suitable to spray water or solvent based paints, varnishes, wood sealers, finishes, primers and stains.


Product Features



  • Spray Paint Gun with efficient compressor with 650W motor

  • Suitable for gloss paint and oil paint

  • 3-way direct dial spray head

  • Carrying strap that lets you carry the machine anywhere

  • Viscosity measuring cup

  • Spray gun with 2,5mm tip size

  • 800 ml paint container


Technical Data



  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • Engine Power: 650W

  • Atomising Output: 105W

  • Max Coverage: 10 - 15 m2 / 10 minutes

  • Viscosity: max 130 DIN/secs

  • Working Pressure: 3 - 4 PSI

  • Tube Length: 1,5 m

  • Paint Container Capacity: 800 ml
description.short_desc:

category.name: Pneumatic Grinders and Accessories
category.path: Pneumatics\Pneumatic Grinders and Accessories

category_idosell.path: Pneumatics\Pneumatic Grinders and Accessories

description.name: Air Orbital Sander 150mm Self-Generated Vacuum
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Palm grip for comfortable and easily controlling

  • Compact lightweight design

  • Low weight housing with rubberized overmold

  • Built-in air regulator allows to adjust sanding speed

  • 6mm Orbital Diameter for super-fine finishes

  • Rear exhausting - self-vacuum


Technical Data



  • Velcro Sanding Pad: 6" / 152mm

  • Maximum Sanding Speed: 9000 rpm

  • Recommended Operating Pressure: 6.3 bar

  • Air consumption at recommended operating pressure: 127 L/min

  • Air Inlet Size: 1/4"

  • Minimum Hose Size: 3/8" / 10 mm

  • Orbital Diameter: 5 mm

  • Vacuum Type: Self-Generated

  • Noise Level: 77 dB

  • Air Inlet Size: 1/4"

  • Minimum Hose Size: 3/8" / 10 mm

  • Orbital Diameter: 5 mm

  • Vacuum Type: Self-Generated

  • Noise Level: 77 dB

description.name: Air Orbital Sander 150mm Central Vacuum PREMIUM
description.long_desc:

  • Palm grip for comfortable and easily controlling

  • Compact lightweight design

  • Low weight housing with rubberized overmold

  • Built-in air regulator allows to adjust sanding speed

  • 6mm Orbital Diameter for super-fine finishes

  • Rear exhausting - central-vacuum

  • Noise Level: 77 dB

description.name: Air Die Grinder Kit with Accessories Assortment
description.long_desc:
Air Die Grinder is a great tool for sanding/grinding, deburring, moulding/routing and engraving in a variety of different materials.


Product Features



  • Advanced control with flipper power switch

  • No-load speed 18000 rpm

  • Compact and lightweight for convenient one-hand operation


Technical Data



  • Maximum Rotary Speed: 18000 rpm

  • Recommended Operating Pressure: 6.3 bar

  • Air consumption at recommended operating pressure: 158 L/min

  • Air Inlet Size: 1/4"


Package Contents:



  • Air die grinder

  • 2x cutting disc dia. 75 mm

  • 10 mounted stones

  • Protective guard

  • 2 wrenches: 14, 17 mm

  • Hex key

  • Mount for cutting disc

  • 1/4" male quick connector

  • 1/4" and 1/8" collets

  • Blow mold case

description.name: Air hammer kit with chisels
description.long_desc:
Features and Benefits

Pistol grip handles are positioned on the rear end of the tool. It is commonly used for vertical operations.

  • For removing rust and cleaning corroded surfaces. Cleans and removes slag.
  • Permanent and safe use thanks to quickly exchangeable needles.
  • Cleans smaller surfaces without messy abrasive blasting.
  • Ergonomic pistol-grip design.

  • Cleans smaller surfaces without messy abrasive blasting.
  • Ergonomic pistol-grip design.

description.name: Air Ratchet Wrench 1/2" GEKO Premium
description.long_desc:
Professional air wrench with maximum torque 80 Nm. Ideal for unscrewing all types of joints in hard-to-reach places. It is equipped with left-right regulation.


Product Features



  • Deliver 160 Nm of torque

  • Lightweight impact resistant composite body

  • Twist-to-reverse mechanism

  • Speed regulation with a knob


Technical Data



  • Drive Size: 1/2"

  • Air inlet Size: 1/4"

  • Maximum Torque: 160 Nm

description.name: Magnetic parts tray 150mm 6"
description.long_desc:
Magnetic parts tray á150mm

á

Tray enables to storeámetal elements during work. The magnet enables to glue the tray in a convenient place and protects the bowl and metal parts kept in it from falling and spilling. The magnet is protected by a rubber, which protects paint from scratching. Tray is made of double pressed, chromed and polished metal sheet.á

á

á

- diameter: 150mmá

- height: 35mmá

- widthá: 20mm

á

description.name: Telescoping inspection mirror 2,25kg/62cm
description.long_desc:
Telescoping pick up toolá2,25kg/62cm

á

Pick up tool with telescopic ending for lifting and holding metal items.áUsefuláwhile installation works in hard approachable places, lifting items etc, Extendable length of a pick up tool.

Perfect for lifting, pulling things out from the hard approcheable places, e.g.:ádrainpipes, from behind lockers, engine compartmentáetc.á

Extendable: 13-62cm

Total length (after extending): 62cm

Magnet diameter: 13mm

description.name: Magnetic pick up tool 500mm
description.long_desc:
Magnetic pick up tool á50cm

á

Easyáto use and effective tool, essential in every workshop or garage. If something metalá(screw, pináetc.) falls into hard approchable place, magnetic pick up tool will help you get them out in few seconds.áFlexible part of the tool can be formed in any way, what makes access to lost items easier.áá

Perfect for lifting, pulling things out from the hard approcheable places, e.g.:ádrainpipes, from behind lockers, engine compartmentáetc.

Total length: 50cm

Magnet diameter: 6mm

description.name: Oil gun 250ml
description.long_desc:
Olejarka o pojemności 250 ml. Przeznaczona do wtłaczania oleju bądź innych środków smarujących w trudno dostępne miejsca takie jak np. mosty napędowe, skrzynie biegów itp.

Charakterystyka produktu

  • zbiornik o pojemności 250 ml
  • duży otwór do uzupełniania oleju
  • giętki wężyk z końcówką
  • rękojeść pistoletowa pozwala na wyrzut oleju pod wysokim ciśnieniem
  • stalowa obudowa, malowana proszkowo
description.short_desc:

Charakterystyka produktu

  • zbiornik o pojemności 250 ml
